app_detail:
The best editing app to Glitch your picture in simple ways ! Glitchy editor is a the best glitch editor to glitch pictures;
It is the best glitch editor app because of it's simplicity that includes easily adding glitched art by adjusting orientation of your glitch effect as well as glitch filter. This glitch editor app allows users to take photos as well as import from your gallery to create glitch wallpaper. The app also features a unique glitch camera which helps you see your glitch applied right away. 

This app provide 2 modes that will allows you to apply glitch effect :
-Camera feature :
it allows you to take picture and edit it after, make sure you have allowed camera permission the application, then you can glitch your taken picture 
-Choose picture from gallery:
You can choose any picture you want from gallery to glitch it with glitch effects that glitch pictures

Features
- take a picture with your a camera and glitch it.
- upload a picture from your gallery and glitch it using glitchy editor.
- You can save the result, share or set it as wallpaper glitch image in SD card or internal storage
- All the glitch images in our app are in high quality 

Functionality :
Glitch Editor :
You can glitch your picture using 2 methods:
- take a picture with your a camera and glitch it.
- upload a picture from your gallery and glitch it using glitchy editor.
- Save the glitched image, Share it or set it as wallpaper

Glitch Text Generator:
You can generate 
- take a picture with your a camera and glitch it.
- upload a picture from your gallery and glitch it using glitchy editor.
- Save the glitched image, Share it or set it as wallpaper

Glitch Wallpapers: 
- Save the glitched image
- Share it 
- Set it as wallpaper (Home or lockscreen)
- all vaporwave and Aesthetic backgrounds are in high quality
- all Glitch wallpapers and backgrounds are in high quality
- possiblity to download any vaporwave,Aesthetic you want
- possiblity to download any glitch,art you want
- possiblity to set as wallpapers any vaporwave,Aesthetic you want
- possiblity to set as wallpapers any glitch,art you want
-all wallpapers of "vaporwave" are here

Glitch Wallpapers application contains : 
- HD glitch backgrounds 
- HD art wallpapers 
- all anime glitch wallpapers
- all art glitch wallpapers and art glitch backgrounds
- HD art abstract wallpapers 
- VHS wallpapers
- Vaporwave and Aesthetic Wallpapers
- all Aesthetic wallpapers are in high quality
- all glitch wallpapers edit by artists by glitch editor apps
